title: Update VS OpenTelemetry Package
body: `Microsoft.VisualStudio.OpenTelemetry.Collector` and `Microsoft.VisualStudio.OpenTelemetry.ClientExtensions` packages were combined to `Microsoft.VisualStudio.OpenTelemetry` to increase performance, we should adopt that.

nodes.body: note: we were adjusting a C++ scenario of consuming msbuild in VS when consuming the packages originally, so it's necessary to look at the first OTel insertion and do the same
Blocked: need to sync with VS OTel folks how the new API works and how it maps to our usage
Deprioritized until VS Telemetry pushes us to do this. (ideally after our scenarios work well by default in VS with the new API)
